chat_history.message:
Hello, my iPhone 13 has a problem:
It shows that it comes with a charger cable and doesn't appear in the order.
Thank you,

Dear ecomobile:

Because the customer's order arrived without a charging cable, we have refunded 10 euros on your behalf.

Regards,
Angely from the Back Care Team

Dear Backcare,

We take note of this. If the customer does not require any further assistance, you can close this conversation. Thank you.

Regards,
CH
